mapper.select: SELECT O1.ISIN, O2.S_DATE, S.NAME, O2.UPDOWN, O2.CLOSE, ABS(O2.CLOSE - ROUND(O2.CLOSE / (1 + (O2.UPDOWN/100)) )) AS GAP FROM (SELECT * FROM PREDICT WHERE S_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND PREDICT = 1 ORDER BY P_RATE DESC) P INNER JOIN (SELECT ISIN, ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY VOLUME)) AS Bottom FROM OHLCV GROUP BY ISIN) O1 ON P.ISIN = O1.ISIN INNER JOIN (SELECT ISIN, ROUND(AVG(PER)) AS AG_PER FROM FUNDAMENTAL GROUP BY ISIN) F ON P.ISIN = F.ISIN INNER JOIN OHLCV O2 ON P.ISIN = O2.ISIN AND P.S_DATE = O2.S_DATE INNER JOIN STOCK S ON P.ISIN = S.ISIN WHERE O2.VOLUME >= O1.Bottom AND F.AG_PER > 1 ORDER BY P.P_RATE DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE INVEST_INFO SET goal = #{goal} WHERE ID = #{id}
